readable.title: 3565598162_56044bc2f7
readable.content: The girls dance to the street musicians Two girls in puffy skirts are dancing in front of some musicians in the street . Two women are dancing while men play music behind them . Two women dancing on a walkway with band in the background and pedestrians walking by Two women in fluffy skirts dancing to music played by men , asking for money , while others pass them by .
